    • Method Detail

      • setCachedKey

        public static void setCachedKey(PublicKey newKey)
        Sets the cached final public key. This is used so VoteBoxes and Supervisors can coordinate their key usage.
        Parameters:
        newKey - - the key to load into the cache. //@param baseKey - the key the newKey must be a derivative of.

      • generateFinalPublicKey

        public static PublicKey generateFinalPublicKey(PublicKey publicKey)
        Generates the "final" public key using the pre-generated public key. This is needed for tallying and NIZK verification. This call returns the same key each time, but this key is different from run to run.
        Parameters:
        publicKey - - the pre-calculated public key.
        Returns:
        the new PublicKey

      • generateFinalPublicKeyNoCache

        protected static PublicKey generateFinalPublicKeyNoCache(PublicKey pubKey)
        Generates the "final" public key using the pre-generated public key. This is needed to actually tally and perform NIZK verification. Additionally, this call will return a different variant of the public key every time it is called.
        Parameters:
        pubKey - - the pre-calculated public key.
        Returns:
        the new PublicKey

      • generateFinalPrivateKey

        public static PrivateKey generateFinalPrivateKey(PublicKey publicKey,
                                 PrivateKey privateKey)
        Generates the "final" PrivateKey from the pre-generated one. This is needed to decrypt the totals calculated with the corresponding final public key.
        Returns:
        the new PrivateKey
